post.title: TPaw Beyond is now TPaw
post.body:
![vmplayer_2017-12-01_03-55-29.png (720x400)](data/img/post_7_vmplayer_2017-12-01_03-55-29.png)

TPaw is dropping the Beyond brand on ZeroNet and will remain as TPaw, just like on the clearnet. Was worth a shot. Tales page will be replaced with PupOS on the website as well as a new page regarding the constructed language simply known as "[The Language](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1White24UrrwQrD86o6Vrc1apgZ1x1o51/1A6rok3j9w6paahtGoxrePy7SSkMz5A48s/1512040294)".
